QueryResult.text: select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, cmn_ui_page.id odf_pk, cmn_ui_page.is_system as is_system, cmn_ui_page.CODE as code, cmn_ui_page.is_active as is_active, odf_ca_ui_page.odf_period_end as odf_period_end, odf_ca_ui_page.odf_period_type as odf_period_type, 'ui_page' as odf_obj_type, CREATED.FULL_NAME as created_by, cmn_ui_page.ODF_BLUEPRINT_ID as odf_blueprint_id, odf_ca_ui_page.odf_period_start as odf_period_start, cmn_ui_page.NAME as name, UPDATED.FULL_NAME as updated_by, NVL( cmn_ui_page.odf_blueprint_id, (select id from odf_blueprints b where b.type = NLS_UPPER('ui_page') and b.is_default = 1 ) ) as odf_blp_active_id, CMN_UI_PAGE.CREATED_DATE as created_date, odf_ca_ui_page.partition_code as partition_code, CMN_UI_PAGE.LAST_UPDATED_DATE as last_updated_date, odf_ca_ui_page.odf_entity_code as odf_entity_code from cmn_ui_page cmn_ui_page JOIN srm_resources CREATED ON CREATED.user_id=cmn_ui_page.created_by JOIN srm_resources UPDATED ON UPDATED.user_id=cmn_ui_page.last_updated_by JOIN odf_ca_ui_page odf_ca_ui_page ON odf_ca_ui_page.id=cmn_ui_page.id where 1 = 1
